General.Name: Fidelity Asian Values
General.Description: Fidelity Asian Values plc is a closed-ended equity mutual fund launched and managed by FIL Investment Services (UK) Limited. The fund is co-managed by FIL Investments International and FIL Investment Management (Hong Kong) Limited. It invests in the public equity markets of Asia, excluding Japan. The fund invests in stocks of companies across all market capitalizations. It invests in stocks of companies across diversified sectors. The fund employs fundamental analysis with a bottom-up stock picking approach to create its portfolio. The fund benchmarks the performance of its portfolio against the MSCI All Countries Far East ex Japan Index. Fidelity Asian Values plc was formed on June 13, 1996 and is domiciled in the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Beech Gate, Tadworth, United Kingdom, KT20 6RP
